title: Competitive Li-ion coordination for constructing a three-dimensional transport network to achieve ultra-high ionic conductivity of a composite solid-state electrolyte
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03134B, Paper
Yiteng Ma, Yong Qiu, Ke Yang, Shun Lv, Yuhang Li, Xufei An, Guanyou Xiao, Zhuo Han, Yuetao Ma, Likun Chen, Danfeng Zhang, Wei Lv, Yun Tian, Tingzheng Hou, Ming Liu, Zhen Zhou, Feiyu Kang, Yan-Bing He
The competitive Li+ coordination environment with a three-dimensional transport network is designed in a composite solid-state electrolyte to realize a high ionic conductivity of 1.03 × 10−3 S cm−1 and ultralong-cycling solid-state batteries at 5C.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
